title: Bergdahl Homecoming Party Canceled, As Joy Turns To Worry
teaser: In Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl's hometown, a celebration had been planned for his homecoming. Now, facing new questions and controversy, the town of Hailey, Idaho, has cancelled that celebration. Jeff Gunter, chief of the Hailey Police Department, explains the decision.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
